00029 int getFileSize(FILE * f){
00030   int file_size;
00031   int prev_pos;
00032   
00033   /* Don't try to get the size of a NULL pointer. */
00034   if(!f)
00035     return -1;
00036 
00037   /* Save the current pointer position. */
00038   prev_pos = ftell(f);
00039

00041   fseek(f, 0, SEEK_END);
00042   /* So the pointer position is the file size. */
00043   file_size = ftell(f);
00044   
00045   /* Take the pointer back to it's original position. */
00046   fseek(f, prev_pos, SEEK_SET);
00047 
00048   return file_size;
